name: Multiplayer SnowBall Game
description: This Is a in development game I have been working on lately. Its a LAN based unity multiplayer snowball fight game to play with your friends. Ideas I have for soon to come will hopefully be: single player mode (AI people to fight), build your own maps, Customize Character, More default maps, and possible vehicles. Some of the current things that are not working: hit-boxes (you can run though walls), weather synchronization on the sever, chat synchronization, usernames, rejoining a game after you log off (just restart the game).
